Instruction: In a skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add sliced carrots and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
In a small bowl, mix tangerine juice and honey to make the glaze.
Pour the tangerine honey glaze over the carrots in the skillet. Add salt and black pepper to taste.
Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 10-12 minutes, or until carrots are tender and glazed, stirring occasionally.
Transfer the glazed carrots to a serving dish, garnish with chopped fresh parsley if desired, and serve hot.
